Approach: Request database type/version, collation/charset, sample failing item values, and expected vs actual behavior before scoping a fix.

Approach: Add an MSSQL migration that converts text-bearing columns from varchar to nvarchar, bump the SQL schema version, and add a regression test validating non-Latin round-trip persistence.
